docs.text:
1. Clone files


git clone https://github.com/KrowNetwork/KrowAlpha


2. Run install script


From the folder that git clone made, run:


chmod +x install.sh


./install.sh


3. Start the model


For the first time only, run the following command:
*


chmod +x startFabric.sh


./startFabric.sh


You shouldn't have to run that command ever again unless the server turns off
docs.title: Installation

docs.text: From the folder that git clone made, run:  chmod +x install.sh  ./install.sh
docs.title: 2. Run install script

docs.text: For the first time only, run the following command: *  chmod +x startFabric.sh  ./startFabric.sh  You shouldn't have to run that command ever again unless the server turns off
docs.title: 3. Start the model

docs.text:
Starting the server


If you have never ran the rest server before, run the following commands from inside the KrowAlpha folder:


cd fabric-tools
./createPeerAdminCard.sh
cd ..
cd krow
composer archive create -t dir -n .
composer runtime install --card PeerAdmin@hlfv1 --businessNetworkName krow
composer network start --card PeerAdmin@hlfv1 --networkAdmin admin --networkAdminEnrollSecret adminpw --archiveFile krow@0.0.1.bna --file networkadmin.card
composer card import --file networkadmin.card




To start the server, run the auto-update script
docs.title: Running

docs.text:
If you have never ran the rest server before, run the following commands from inside the KrowAlpha folder:  cd fabric-tools
./createPeerAdminCard.sh
cd ..
cd krow
composer archive create -t dir -n .
composer runtime install --card PeerAdmin@hlfv1 --businessNetworkName krow
composer network start --card PeerAdmin@hlfv1 --networkAdmin admin --networkAdminEnrollSecret adminpw --archiveFile krow@0.0.1.bna --file networkadmin.card
composer card import --file networkadmin.card  To start the server, run the auto-update script
docs.title: Starting the server

docs.text:
If you have never ran the auto update script, navigate to the KrowAlpha folder, and run the following:


chmod +x auto-update.sh


To run:


./auto-update.sh BRANCH PORT


Parameters:

1. BRANCH - github branch to use (master, etc)

2. PORT - port to run on (8888, 5555, 3333, etc)


Example: 


./auto-update.sh master 8888
docs.title: Auto update script

docs.text:
Instantiate Krow


CURRENTLY, PYTHON CODE CAN ONLY BE WRITTEN AND RAN IN THE PYTHON FOLDER

To instantiate a Krow object, use the following command:


import Krow

krow = Krow(PUT A RANDOM STRING IN HERE IT DOESNT MATTER YET)
docs.title: Python
